Posts.Content: Shelleylala wrote: I recently received the results of my breast biopsy. Was happy there was no cancer but then received a few phone calls and a letter telling me I have "high risk" findings. I have an appointment for a surgical consultation this Friday at 1030. I am not sure what to expect and I'm scared. Log in to post a reply

Posts.Title: Had my surgical biopsy yesterday Shelleylala Shelleylala

Posts.Content: Shelleylala wrote: I had the biopsy yesterday. They had found what they called "groupings of suspicious calcifications on my mammogram a few weeks back. I saw on my mammogram report they had put Birad 4. After the biopsy my radiologist said there are three different results I can get. Benign, atypical cells, or cancer. He said if it's cancer it would be DCIS. Would he be able to tell this from looking at the samples? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stereotactic Breast Biopsy Shelleylala Shelleylala

Posts.Content: Shelleylala wrote: Yesterday I had my wire guided breast biopsy. It went well. I was very nervous about the wire insertion. That went quicker than I thought and wasn't as bad as I imagined. The nurses I had were wonderful. I'm just glad it's done. I see my Dr on the 22nd for the results. I'm off work for 10 days. Going to relax and enjoy my family Log in to post a reply
